title: Who is Eileen Higgins? What to know about Miami mayoral election winner
shortDescription: Eileen Higgins coasted to victory in Miami's mayoral election, defeating Trump's preferred candidate. Here's what to know about her.

title: Judge blocks Trump’s deployment of the National Guard in Los Angeles
shortDescription: A federal judge on Dec. 10 blocked President Donald Trump’s deployment of the National Guard in Los Angeles, according to a court filing.

title: What is Trump's approval rating in the states? More rallies planned
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's approval rating has fallen to negative in two states: Iowa and Ohio. See his popularity in other states where he backs elections.

title: Medicare for all is one issue animating progressive Democrats in 2026
shortDescription: Progressive Democrats are leaning into issues like affordability and fighting the billionaire class in the 2026 midterms.

title: Trump slams 'stupid people' at rally
shortDescription: President Donald Trump held his first domestic rally in months to kick off the 2026 midterm campaign trail.

title: Is Trump’s new ballroom doubling in size?
shortDescription: Once the White House submits its plans this month, the National Capital Planning Commission is expected to consider the proposal early next year.

title: Progressives banging at Democratic primary gates in 2026 midterms
shortDescription: Democrats will witness a nationwide debate about the party's future in the 2026 primary season that could elevate a new generation of progressives

title: Trump slams 'stupid people,' defends economic record in Pennsylvania rally
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will be holding more economic events before the 2026 midterms with Americans frustrated and Republicans' majority on the line.

title: See Trump speak on economy, lowering prices at Pennsylvania rally
shortDescription: President Trump discusses his administration's economic agenda during an event at Mount Airy Casino Resort on Dec. 9, 2025, in Mount Pocono, Pennsylvania.

title: Congress pushes to withhold Pentagon funding over boat strikes footage
shortDescription: The 'Gang of Eight' met with top brass on Dec. 9 to discuss much-scrutinized September boat strikes.

title: It's official. Biden's signature student loan repayment plan is over.
shortDescription: The Trump administration announced a joint legal settlement that will end Biden's main student debt relief program.

title: Supreme Court may toss campaign finance limit targeted by Trump, GOP
shortDescription: The Republican Party wants the Supreme Court to overturn a 2001 decision aimed at preventing donors from bypassing limits on what they can give candidates.

title: Nancy Mace says GOP leaders marginalize members, including women
shortDescription: Rep. Nancy Mace, R-South Carolina, lays into her party's House leaders in a new opinion article published by the New York Times.
